text: Hi Muniza! Sorry I haven't had time to properly look at your shot yet, but I will do soon :slightly_smiling_face: Ahh Katie is a wonderful human, it's so cool you got to speak to her. Her reel feedback is so good. What advice did she give you?

Hi! No worries! Some of the advice she gave me was to focus on exaggerating the poses for the dance animation so that it doesn't look like mo cap. And she said that although the butterfly animation was nice, it doesn't quite fit in with the rest of my showreel which is more stylised animation.

For my current animation, she asked me to use the bendy controls on the arms and legs to give the limbs a bit more appeal and weight. She said she didn't notice that the waiter was about to tap on the girls shoulder and that I should have a bigger anticipate.
